short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change every font on the website to Comic Sans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever dreamed of making your internet browsing more fun and lively? Allow yourself a touch of humor and lightness with our "Comic Sans Everywhere" extension!
